title: Latex Shark

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, lurk around a player's home. All their visitors will be scared and go back home, thus causing their action to fail. Your target will also be roleblocked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If there's only one visitor, you will have a 20% chance of transfuring them. Otherwise, you will not transfur visitors.

desc:
Post 3611
*"I've got bad memories about the actual [EXPLICIT]. Not sure why ███ would even consider making this stupid [EXPLICIT]" -Dr.J██████d, MIT.*
